abstract: The move to sell the asset-management arm of Russell Investments was widely anticipated after the Lodnon Stock Exchange bought the owner of the Russell 2000 stock market index last year.

headline.main: London Stock Exchange Looks to Sell Russell Asset Management Business

snippet: The move to sell the asset-management arm of Russell Investments was widely anticipated after the Lodnon Stock Exchange bought the owner of the Russell 2000 stock market index last year.
